alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascade Foothills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 08 at 2:58PM PST until December 09 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON FRIDAY TO MIDNIGHT PST FRIDAY NIGHT ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. For the second Winter Weather Advisory above 2000 feet, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, except 8 to 12 inches above 2500 feet. * WHERE...South Washington Cascade Foothills. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until midnight PST tonight. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from noon Friday to midnight PST Friday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
